entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Baie-Saint-Paul
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:14 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
